name: Tower - Side by Side
description:
Submission for Nokia game jam 3.

The actual coding started yesterday, hopefully it can be done.

The game is a tower defense type of game where player switch to different side to stop monster evading. The towers are designed to be auto shooting but they need to be filled ammo and energy manually. 

Player starting at title screen typing 7529(stands for PLAY) to start. The number sequence has to matched to unlock into play stage.

Once at play stage, the player uses key 5(emulated as 'w' in this case) to switch the side. Towers of the side in operation will shoot automatically where the other side, the tower stop shooting but the monsters keep moving close to the tower.

Original num pad layout

Emulated key pad layout
